Title: FolderDrive
Description:
FolderDrive is a small tool that turns your folders into drives. Imagine having your Dropbox folder behaving as the (almost real) harddrive. It's another handy solution in the ongoing quest for quick access to your favorite folders.

The project is developed in C# using WPF - you'll need .NET framework 4 to use it.
